Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for service credit related to the birth or adoption of a new child
Summary: Provides for service credit related to the birth or adoption of a new child for certain correction officer retirement system members.
LawCode: Amd ยง513, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service credit related to the birth or adoption of a new child
